name: Magic Ball!
description:
Magic Ball!

  • This is a Educational Game which can help middle schoolers in grade 3-4th better understand the concept of 'Greater than and Less than' as my game uses that concept and makes is it a main component of the game. The game will try to predict the users chosen number with help of greater than and less than. The aesthetics of the game are attractive and appealing to the eyes of children. This makes it fun and interesting for them and helps them learn through interactive user interface. Since this my first project and a school project for raising funds for blind people for their better living envoirment and treatment
  • This is  for Educational Purposes that is why I have decided to for it to be free.
  • Since this my first time creating a game using C# and Unity as a school project for raising funds for blind people and for their better living envoirment and treatment, Donations are appreciated :)
